page.description: Download a file from the server to the user's machine.

section.description: Used with the Grid and UX components

section.title: File Download in a UX Component

description.p: In order to add an event handler that performs a file download action for an embedded object (i.e. a file that is stored in a binary field in a table), you must add a special [File Upload/Download] control to the UX component.
The [File Upload/Download] control is in the Other Controls section of the Toolbox.
Once you have added the [File Upload/Download] control, you can then use Action Javascript to define a File Download action.
